methods.description: Converts amount in one currency to that of another

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Currency symbol for the converted from amount

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Currency symbol for the converted to amount

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of currency to be converted

apiDescription: This API enables you to convert an amount of one currency into another currency using current foreign exchange rates.
